entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
